channel.title: LoTRFM - Mafia Chat
channel.description:
# Vulgard:
> # [color=red]Sauron[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Leader[/color]** > > ![image|300x403,100%](upload://jawtHOIMp5IsgSZ84KNlPYK3ZPz.jpeg) >*The Dark Lord and creator of the One Ring.* **Dark Lord (Passive)** - You are invincible to all means of death besides attacks from the bearer of the Ring, and lynching. If you die by either means, you may select a player, converting them to the Mafia and changing their class card to **Eye of Sauron**. While the **Eye of Sauron** is alive, you may post in the Mafia chat while dead. You appear as town to faction checks. **Necromancy (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer of a Town aligned player, you will summon a skeleton, up to a maximum of three skeletons. On any given night, you may use your skeletons to either attack a player or defend another member of the mafia. Each skeleton is one use only. You will not be seen as visiting the target while using this ability. **Dark Magic (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will not be seen as visiting the target. **Ring Sight (Day)** - At the end of the day, the names of any **husks** will be revealed to you. [1 Use] **In the Darkness Bind Them (Day)** - Disable the effects of the Ring for the coming night and receive the ringholder's feedback at the end of the coming night. [1 Use] **Willpower (Day)** - Target a member of the mafia, their non-killing ability will empowered tonight. [3 Uses] **Hook-Mace (Night)** - Target two players, the first player will be redirected to the second. [Infinite Uses] **Slaughter (Night)** - Attack a player. [1 Use] **One Ring to Rule Them All (Night | Ring)** - If you hold the ring, you may target a player, occupying them and learning their class card. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*
# ~~DatBird:~~
> # [color=red]Witch-King of Angmar[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Ringwraith[/color]** > > ![image|360x434](upload://nL81FQ3AJTaTRRww3IcCBzRF0EW.png) > *Leader of the Ringwraiths and chosen of Sauron to retrieve the ring.* >**Fellbeast Mount (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer a town aligned player, you gain an additional use of **Morgul-Blade** and you may target two people with **Ringwraith**. **Fallen (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, your target will not be able to post in the dead-chat. **Morgul-Blade (Day)** - Target a player, you will stab them with your morgul-blade in the wraith-world, poisoning them. They will die in two nights unless healed. [3 Uses] **Ringwraith (Night)** - Target a player, you will be informed whether they hold the ring or not. [Infinite Uses]. **Will of Sauron (Night)** - Target a player, if you have determined they hold the ring via **Ringwraith**, you will attack them. Otherwise, this does nothing. [3 Uses] **Chosen of Sauron (Night | Ring)** - If you hold the ring, target a player, you will attack them. This has a one night cooldown. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*
# SetToBlow
> # [color=red]Lurtz[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Berserker[/color]** > > ![image|315x242](upload://2Ki0O46uMiOcXMXSygbD9Pb7NMM.jpeg) > *The first of Saruman's Uruk-hai; stronger than the rest, you pursue your prey viciously.* > **Uruk-hai (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer of a town aligned player, you may choose three alive players to occupy and you gain an additional use of **Bone Archer**. **Brute Force (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will bypass night immunity and healing. You are also immune to occupation and redirection while performing night actions besides the factional kill. **Bone Archer (Day)** - If target player has claimed one or more of their abilities, you will dayvig them. [3 Uses] **Pursuit (Night)** - Target a player, you will occupy them, preventing their night action. [Infinite Uses] **Stake Out (Night)** - Target a player, any one visiting them will be occupied. [1 Use] **Unnatural Warrior (Night | Ring)** - If you hold the ring, you may target a player, they will be occupied and anyone town member visiting them will be occupied as well. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*
# Arete:
> # [color=red]Gothmog[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Janitor[/color]** > > ![image|290x126](upload://1sq1M9D3gczVhsGhppo27ZRBOdM.png) > *Lieutenant of the Witch-King of Angmar. You perform your orders with glee...* > **Orc (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer of a town aligned player, all town aligned players will appear as Mafia for the coming night. **Defile (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, your target's flip will be cleaned. **Rend (Day)** - Target a player, they will receive incorrect feedback tonight. [3 Uses] **Deface (Day)** - Target a player, if they are lynched today, their flip will be cleaned. [1 Use] **Hide (Night)** - Target a member of the mafia, they will appear as a member of the town to alignment checks tonight. [Infinite Uses] **Bloody (Night)** - Target a player, they will appear as a member of the mafia to alignment checks. [Infinite Uses] **Warg Rider (Night | Ring)** - If you hold the ring, you may target a member of the mafia, their kill will bypass night immunity and healing and their target's flip will be cleaned. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*
# Marshal:
> # [color=red]Mouth of Sauron[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Misdirector[/color]** > > ![image|350x277](upload://2xXAOZRsiRIWpG95q2RFkvYjlJ8.jpeg) > *Sauron's messenger and negotiator.* > **Sauron's Will (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer of a town aligned player, you may select three players who cannot be healed tonight. **Demonic Voice (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will redirect all visitors to you to themselves. **Influence (Day)** - Target a player, their vote will count as two today. [3 Uses] **Lie (Night)** - Target a player, they will receive incorrect feedback from their ability tonight [Infinite Uses] **Diversion (Night)** - Target a player, any positive effects on them tonight will be removed. [3 Uses] **Rally (Night | Ring)** - If you hold the ring, you may heal all members of the mafia tonight. This has a one-night cooldown. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*
# ~~Kai_5:~~
> # [color=red]Grima Wormtoungue[/color] > **[color=red]Mafia Control[/color]** > > ![image|334x500](upload://yq37chctDyD6RkHYFEwrYcsxMTi.jpeg) > *Advisor to King Theoden and corrupted by Saruman to control Theoden.* **Sly Words (Passive)** - If you are the hammerer of a town aligned player, you may use both night abilities tonight. **Disguise (Passive)** - If you perform the factional kill, you will appear as town to investigators. **Slip Poison (Day)** - Target a player, they will be poisoned and will die in two nights time unless healed. [3 Uses] **Usurp (Day)** - Target a player, their vote will be negated today. [3 Uses] **In-Depth Investigation (Night)** - Mark a player, if one marked player visits another one, you will receive their class cards. They will be informed that they were marked, but not know what it means.[Infinite Use] **Disrupt (Night)** - If target player is marked, you may remove any healing or protection they receive tonight. [3 Uses] **Backstab (Night | Ring)** - If you have the ring and target player is marked, you will attack them. [Infinite Uses] *Goal: Eliminate the Town*

if it does go through then we stick with the Bree plan

I’m going to wait for Sulit to get on before submitting the kill

Read full topic
